thread.title: New management team at college after “failures”
thread.title_full: New management team at college after “failures” - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: New management team at college after “failures”
text:
1
Have your say The chairman and board of Glasgow Clyde College have been removed by the Education Secretary.
Angela Constance used ministerial powers following “repeated incidences of board failure relating to governance, including breaches of its terms and conditions of grant”.
The decision follows a row over the suspension of the college’s principal, Susan Walsh, in February.
